title: Missing Honor caspule
body: i just hit honor level 3 and it said i got a capsule but when i went and looked at the loot tab it was no where to be seen, what can i do about this.

replies.body: I looked into this for you, but was unable to locate any capsules unlocked on the account.  I'm curious if the notification you received was an intro to Level 3 letting you know about capsules.  Sometimes capsules or fragments can be delayed too, and may require relogging to acquire.
